@@ -84,3 +84,1 @@

-                                                           : check_appcds_disabled;
-        run(toCheck, appJar, "-Xlog:class+load", "JvmtiApp", "bootonly", addbootJar); // appcds should be disabled

@@ -122,3 +122,1 @@

-                           check_appcds_disabled;
-        run(toCheck, appJar,
+        run(check_appcds_disabled, appJar,
